name: Hiladdar_Belts
title: Hiladdar's Belts
author: Hiladdar
description: 5 additional tiers of transport belts, underground belts, and splitters from item speed of 70 to 250, and player configurable underground belt length.  If Hiladdar's Gear module is included, then last two tiers utilize gravitanium plates and solvant to manufacture.
